name: T (monninen, Tipu)
description:
A game that was meant to be made in 3 hours. (It was made in ~4.5 hour, oops)

In T you are trying to make some tea based on orders you get. 

 Every tea cup is on conveyor belt, and every cup that you can't finish is sent straight to trash.

Try to collect as many points as you can, by making tea with correct ingredients.


Controls:

-Mouse (Drag and drop) 
-Mouse (Click menu buttons)
-Mouse (Click the "Rate this game" -button)

Credits:

-Tipu (Programming)
-Monni (Art)
-Dasnukki (Music)
